name: The Drive (SurenGames)
description:
The Drive is a survival racing game set in Croatia.

Premise:

You are a 19 year old living in the Marinovac County. You moved here when you bought the house. The year is 2007 and you bought this house last year. You have a van.  You need to survive any way possible.

Disclaimer!

THE GAME IS IN PRE ALPHA STAGE OF DEVELOPMENT!

Current Version: 0.1.1
